47.name: Raptor Slayer
47.description: These birds of prey have met their predator.

58.name: Hammer Master
58.description: When you absolutely want to turn your foes into jelly, this is your weapon.
58.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a hammer.

85.name: Armorsmith
85.requirement: Reach rating  in the armorsmithing discipline.

222.name: Speedy Reader
222.description: Broken into twenty volumes for easy reading!
222.requirement: Read the complete history of the founding of Ebonhawke in one day.

273.name: Shadow
273.description: Never should have turned their back on you.

384.name: Solid Ocean Fractal Stabilizer
384.description: Don't forget to ride the wave.
384.requirement: You've completed the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

395.name: Take a Bow
395.requirement: You and the captured colossus of the Cliffside fractal share a moment of respect.

480.name: Ascalonian Veteran Killer
480.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

537.name: Secret Contact
537.description: Agent Brandubh is trying to find and translate dead-drop messages from his partner, who is undercover in the dredge-Flame Legion alliance. Get a cryptotranslator from Agent Brandubh. It will help locate the dead drops across Diessa Plateau and Wayfarer Foothills and then decrypt them for you.
537.requirement: Use the Order Cryptotranslator to decrypt  dead drops.

599.name: Southsun River Sample Collection
599.description: Collect a sample from the river to the west of Driftglass Springs.

683.name: Equipment Failure
683.requirement: Leave Frizz crushed in his lab.

743.name: Gnashblade: Homeland Support
743.requirement: Complete events in the Ascalon region while supporting Evon Gnashblade.

751.name: Southsun Survival: High Scorer
751.requirement: Earn points while playing Southsun Survival.

874.name: Master of Secrets, World 2
874.description: What was hidden is now revealed.
874.requirement: Find every hidden room (excluding furniture shops) in World 2, Zone 3.

bits.text: The candle is too weak.
Perform a melody near the yeti mountain.
Perform a melody without falling.
Perform a melody on a ledge above exploding barrels.
Perform a melody in a room full of ice spikes.
The beginning of a frozen maze.
After performing, left.
Tucked away after a checkpoint.
Don't look down.
Before bombing an icicle.
A cave underneath the ice.
Before a portal.
A roundabout secret.
After performing, right.
After performing, straight ahead.
Perform a melody on a slippery corner.
This is bananas.

883.name: Here Be Dragons!
883.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter  times.

999.name: WvW Premier Season: 9th Place
999.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

1036.name: Jumping Mad III
1036.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles.

1096.name: Toxic Golem Gardener
1096.requirement: Escort a siege golem to destroy a toxic offshoot.

1104.name: Tower Antitoxin Injector
1104.requirement: Inject  dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.

1178.name: Toxic Pollen Survival
1178.requirement: Survive in toxic pollen for  pulses.

1212.name: Aftermath Toxic Field Researcher I
1212.requirement: Collect  toxic spore samples by destroying toxic offshoots.

1370.name: Let It Glow
1370.requirement: Control the altar and transform into a Spirit of Light.

1378.name: Thaw That Claw
1378.requirement: Summon the Claw of Koda at the shrine.

1400.name: Trader's Forum Triumphant
1400.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1400.requirement: Completely retake Trader's Forum and its surrounding areas.

1509.name: In Tune
1509.description: Story Instance: Battle on the Breachmaker
1509.requirement: While fighting Scarlet's Prime Hologram, never hit a hologram without the respective attunement.

1672.name: Leave No Survivors
1672.requirement: Vanquish every enemy group, including ambushes and traps, while helping Taimi collect parts for her device.

1703.name: Defender of the Tiny
1703.requirement: Protect Taimi from taking any damage while she controls her recalibration device.

1820.name: Light 'Em Up
1820.description: Story Instance: Tracking the Aspect Masters
1820.requirement: Find an alternative way to destroy the rooted Mordrem leeching thrasher blocking the pathway.

1831.name: Aggressive Infiltration
1831.requirement: Complete "Meeting the Asura" without dying, and sound every room's alarm.

1969.name: Daily Maguuma Jungle Miner
1969.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1969.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

2034.name: Honorary Krewe Member
2034.description: You must be this smart to enter.
2034.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's workshop in Divinity's Reach.

2154.name: A Stomping Good Time
2154.requirement: Use 20 Scarecrow or Mad King stomps against players in PvP or WvW.

2171.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 40
2171.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2256.name: Prismatic Plunderer
2256.requirement: Pick up a wyvern crystal for the skritt.

2275.name: Enchanted Armor Wearer
2275.description: When you've got the glow, your body's gold!
2275.requirement: Use the Exalted device to enter enchanted armor in Dragon's Stand.

2343.name: Dive Master: Verdant Brink
2343.requirement: Use the diving goggles found in the Pact fleet wreckage in Verdant Brink.

2469.name: Dug In
2469.requirement: Help the soldiers build up their defenses.

2488.name: Leave It to Me
2488.requirement: Complete the teamwork trial without reviving any Pact soldiers.

2526.name: Beetle Feast: Silver
2526.requirement: Eat yellow mushrooms to score points and blue mushrooms to gain abilities that help you in your hunt. Beware of the poisonous mushrooms with green spores, and use your burrow ability to bypass closed gates!

2551.name: Cleaning House
2551.requirement: Locate and destroy all of the active Rata Novan security mechanisms throughout the city.

2588.name: Howler II: The Perfected Warhorn
2588.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Howl has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to balancing a horn.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secret to weighting a warhorn mouthpiece.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2632.name: Now That's a Fungus
2632.requirement: Locate the Mushroom King near the Itzel village and help the Itzel farmer defeat it so that they can bring the meat home for his soup recipe.

2690.name: League Recruit
2690.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.

2708.name: League Necromancer—Champion
2708.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Champion achievement.
2708.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as a necromancer.

2710.name: League Dominator—Veteran
2710.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.
2710.requirement: Win 4 ranked matches in a day.

2875.name: The Super Adventure
2875.requirement: Unlock all  Super Adventure weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2892.name: Daily Tier 4 Swampland
2892.requirement: Complete Swampland at fractal scale 76 or higher.

2906.name: Spirit of the Tiger
2906.description: Find the lost tiger dens throughout Tyria.

bits.text: Tangled Depths: SCAR Lane
Caledon Forest: Dreamdark Enclave
Southsun Cove: Southsun Strait
Sparkfly Fen: Orvanic Shore
Lornar's Pass: Demon's Maw
Diessa Plateau: The Breached Wall
Fields of Ruin: Tanglerot Hills
Plains of Ashford: Loreclaw Expanse
Verdant Brink: Skyclaw Peaks
Tangled Depths: Rata Novus Lane
Dragon's Stand: Broken Altar

2933.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: Secluded Tour
2933.description: There must be somewhere in Tyria where tigers can live in peace.

bits.text: Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin.
Complete the Griffonrook Run jumping puzzle in Lornar's Pass.
Loot the Splendid Chest in Rebel's Seclusion in Fireheart Rise.
Complete the Collapsed Observatory jumping puzzle in Kessex Hills.
Complete the Craze's Folly jumping puzzle in Blazeridge Steppes.
Complete the Demongrub Pits jumping puzzle in Queensdale.
Complete the Fawcett's Bounty jumping puzzle in Harathi Hinterlands.
Reach the vista in Lightfoot Passage in the Straits of Devastation.
Find the den location in the Hidden Garden jumping puzzle.
Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin after scouting all of the locations.

2950.name: Daily Tier 3 Underground Facility
2950.requirement: Complete Underground Facility at fractal scale 51 or higher.

2972.name: Daily Tier 3 Swampland
2972.requirement: Complete Swampland at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3026.name: Fragmented Anomaly
3026.requirement: Disperse a Ley-Line Anomaly without it reabsorbing any fragments.

3067.name: Conquer the Creator
3067.requirement: Defeat an ArenaNet employee in Player vs. Player combat.

3083.name: Daily Bloodstone Fen Ghostly Justiciar Killer
3083.description: Defeating ancient foes one day at a time.
3083.requirement: Defeat the Ghostly Justiciar in the Colosseum of the Faithful, located above Bloodstone Fen.

3104.name: Hungry Hal
3104.requirement: Find and feed this poor hungry soul on the island.

3144.name: Artifacts of the Coliseum
3144.description: These shall be ours and only ours!
3144.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that captures an artifact in Eternal Coliseum rated matches  time.

3228.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 59
3228.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3235.name: Cultural Attaché
3235.requirement: Bring Aurene souvenirs from around Tyria to teach her about the cultures of the world.

bits.text: The queen of Kryta called for a ceremony that attracted many unexpected guests.
The charr have many Weapons but perhaps the only Weapon they need is the genius of their automobile engineering.
The sacrifices of the norn's greatest heroes spills out of their Steadings giving Karma to us all.
The pride of the Arcane Council must be the height of the asuran technologies; those precious gates of theirs.
Those sylvari following the Maker's Path might look out from the terrace and find that what brings them the most Karma is that of creating life from dirt and sun.
Only an Ornithologist of questionable sanity would study a risen chicken.
When dusk fell upon the Zephyrites and the last gleam of moonglow lit their way, only prosperity could save them.

3289.name: Skyhammer Assaulter
3289.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during Skyhammer rated matches.

3341.name: Dusk Slayer
3341.requirement: Defeat  player during Battle of Champion's Dusk rated matches.

3381.name: Riddle Me This
3381.description:
Story Instance: Confessor's End

"And be ready with your favorite color."
3381.requirement: Complete Confessor's End without answering any riddle question incorrectly.

3383.name: Cin Business
3383.description: "What have you got for ol' Cin, eh?"
3383.requirement: Find goods that might interest Cin—some that he lost, some that he wants to sell.

bits.text: Found in Lakeside Bazaar.
Carried by White Mantle forces.
Found in the Harvest Cascades.
Found in Watchtower Cliffs.
Carried by Bandit Spirits in Doric Lumber Yard.
Found near Saidra's Haven.
Found in Doric's Landing.
Found in New Loamhurst.
Found in Watcher's Hollow.
Found in Watcher's Hollow.
Found in Eastern Divinity Reservoir.
Found in Melandru's Refuge.
Found in Saidra's Haven.
Carried by Justiciar Agatha in Saidra's Haven.
Carried by Cairn the Queenslayer in New Loamhurst.
Carried by Siegemaster Immelhoof in Watchtower Cliffs and the Harvest Cascades.
Found in Fort Evennia.
Found in Mantle's Breach.

3484.name: Fearless
3484.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"Self-confidence in spades."
3484.requirement: Defeat the Manifestation of Self-Doubt in the Shining Blade headquarters without using Minor Breakthrough to help you.

3486.name: Pruning the Weed
3486.description: For some, there is no happy ending.

3528.name: Closing the Loop
3528.requirement: Complete the Shattered Observatory fractal on the master tier.

3537.name: Art Critic
3537.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"I may not know art, but I know what I dislike."
3537.requirement: Destroy all statues in the hideout.

3644.name: A Trip Down Memory Lane
3644.description: Just like old times! But without the hydras...
3644.requirement: Win the memory game hosted by a lonely ghost.

3655.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Amnoon Bazaar
3655.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3657.name: Social Butterfly
3657.requirement: Talk to all of your party guests.

3675.name: Down in Flames
3675.requirement: Defeat the Herald of Balthazar without taking damage from her Flame Wall.

3687.name: Cavalier Express: Silver
3687.requirement: Quickly deliver parcels for the Cavalier Express!

3781.name: Desolation Griffon Master: Silver
3781.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3819.name: Imposter Syndrome
3819.requirement: Defeat a clone of yourself during the legendary doppelganger group event.

3877.name: Track Record
3877.requirement: Complete each race in Crystal Oasis, Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, and the Domain of Vabbi.

bits.text: Complete the Crystal Oasis Race
Complete the Desert Highlands Race
Complete the Desolation Race
Complete the Elon Riverlands Race
Complete the Domain of Vabbi Race

3894.name: Master Weaver
3894.requirement: Completely train the elementalist's weaver elite specialization.

3936.name: Lunatic Racer
3936.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth in under two minutes.

3964.name: Astral Purification
3964.description: You think you can purify Kralkatite through a confluence of astral energy if focused correctly.

bits.text: Bring Ouissal the materials to craft a charged mirror.
Bring Ouissal the materials to craft a corrupted mirror.
Bring Ouissal the materials to craft a crystal mirror.
Bring Ouissal the materials to craft a glacial mirror.
Bring Ouissal the materials to craft a destroyer mirror.
Bring Ouissal the materials to craft a molten mirror.
Bring Ouissal the materials to craft an onyx mirror.
Place the charged mirror above the Field of the Hopeful.
Place the corrupted mirror in the bluffs above Palawadan.
Place the crystal mirror overlooking Champion's Dawn.
Place the glacial mirror high above the Modri Caverns.
Place the destroyer mirror in the Churrhir Cliffs.
Place the molten mirror above Jakumba's Legacy.
Place the onyx mirror atop the Mordant Crescent Great Hall.
Bring Yasna's notes to Sunsmith Oiussal in the Sunspear Base.

4087.name: (Annual) Golden Firestarter
4087.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Firecracker Lighting adventure in Divinity's Reach. This achievement can be completed once a year.

4116.name: Daily Sandswept Isles Racer
4116.requirement: Complete a race within the Sandswept Isles.

4267.name: Daily Kourna: Volatile Magic Collector
4267.requirement: Collect volatile magic around the Moon Fortress.

4287.name: Boss of Bosses
4287.requirement: Complete  Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

4321.name: Man Overboard!
4321.description: Who jumps off a perfectly good airship?
4321.requirement: Perform a dive off the deck of Kiel's airship, "Phoenix Dawn," into the water below.

4325.name: Mantle Mauler
4325.requirement: Kill  White Mantle cultist in the Crown Pavilion.

4351.name: Swan Dive
4351.description: "Wait, no! Don't give the children ideas!"—Laila
4351.requirement: Find the diving goggles in Sun's Refuge and jump into the water.

4364.name: Aquatic Assassins
4364.description: It takes great skill to best largos within their domain!

4400.name: Unbranded
4400.description:
You've never been a fan of that brand.

Story Instance: Legacy
4400.requirement: Complete Legacy without being encompassed in Branded crystal.

4428.name: Raptor Out
4428.requirement: Escape the Mists in the required time.

4432.name: Requiem: Experiment 2
4432.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4533.name: Chasing Tales: Elegos the Harmless
4533.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood staff and perform tasks to re-create Elegos's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Elegos the Harmless.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Elegos: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Elegos: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Elegos: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Elegos at a heroic font.

4544.name: "All or Nothing" Mastery
4544.requirement: Complete all  All or Nothing achievements.

4568.name: Chasing Tales: Elusive Skirmisher
4568.requirement: Defeat 10 enemies with a short bow without being struck in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Mosa the Majestic.
Defeated 10 enemies with a short bow without being struck in Thunderhead Peaks.

4589.name: Chasing Tales: Call to Action
4589.description: After his death, Codd's prized warhorn was cast in bronze and promptly pitched into the sea.
4589.requirement: Defeat 60 Branded enemies while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Codd the Cheerful.
Defeated 60 Branded enemies while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

4637.name: Perfect Fit
4637.requirement: Sit in each of the many boxes throughout Tyria.

bits.text: Sit in a box near the blue catmander.
Sit in a box near the yellow catmander.
Keep watch over the prisoners from a box in the Grove.
Closely watch the fish from a box in Rata Sum.
Sit in a box and prepare for war in the Black Citadel.
Keep warm in a box while paying your respects in Hoelbrak.
Sit in a box to join the menagerie in Divinity's Reach.
Watch the light move from a box in Lion's Arch.

4653.name: Master of Coins, World 1
4653.requirement: Get a Gold award in each time challenge Adventure in World 1.

bits.text: Zone 01
Zone 02
Zone 03

4668.name: Skyscale Flight
4668.requirement: Help your skyscale get accustomed to flying with you, and help Gorrik investigate various tears in reality that have appeared in the air across Tyria. Find Flying Lesson nodes near the tears to call your skyscale to you.

bits.text: Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Jahai Bluffs.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in the Domain of Vabbi.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Sandswept Isles.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in the Domain of Kourna.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in the Desolation.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in the Domain of Istan.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Thunderhead Peaks.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Elon Riverlands.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Dragonfall.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Drytop.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Crystal Oasis.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in the Silverwastes.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Blazeridge Steppes.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Diessa Plateau.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Fireheart Rise.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Iron Marches.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Frostgorge Sound.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Lornar's Pass.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Timberline Falls.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Sparkfly Fen.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Mount Maelstrom.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Bloodtide Coast.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Harathi Hinterlands.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Desert Highlands.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Straits of Devastation.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Cursed Shore.
Investigate reality tears with your skyscale in Malchor's Leap.

4690.name: Dragonfall Insight: Gnarlgrove Overlook
4690.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Dragonfall.

4774.name: Visions of Sandswept Isles
4774.description:
Sandswept Isles, where the shortsighted seek immediate power and knowledge.

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievements.
4774.requirement: Explore the Sandswept Isles for greater insight.
4774.locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this collection.

4866.name: (Annual) Ogre Obliterator
4866.requirement: Kill  ogre in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4907.name: Daily Grothmar Concert Participant
4907.requirement: Complete the Metal Legion Concert meta-event.

4950.name: Well Watcher
4950.requirement: Defeat Murakai, Doomlore's Bane without stepping into any of her wells. Must be present at the start of the event to qualify.

4975.name: Gauntlet of the Khan-Ur
4975.requirement: Reach the end of the Gauntlet of the Khan-Ur.

4982.name: Hot Feet
4982.requirement: Complete the Flame Legion jumping puzzle without healing.

5009.name: Daily Legendary Hunter
5009.requirement: Defeat a legendary creature in the Raven Sanctum.

5020.name: The Hunger
5020.requirement: Collect all the food Bright Shore desires.
5020.locked_text: Find Bright Shore in the forest.

bits.text: Seek the norn who knows how to obtain foreign goods.
Give this to Bright Shore in the forest.
Search the pass where the plains are open.
Give this to Bright Shore in the forest.
Often found grazing on bushes.
Give this to Bright Shore in the forest.
They roam where the spirit is honored.
Give this to Bright Shore in the forest.
Explore the forest.
Give this to Bright Shore in the forest.
It hunts. It waits.
Give this to Bright Shore in the forest.

5025.name: Daily Drakkar Victory
5025.requirement: Prevent Drakkar from becoming more powerful by aiding Jhavi in her attack.

5121.name: Get Off My Shield
5121.requirement: Repel Drakkar's attack on Jhavi's shield in 10 seconds or less.

5123.name: Sanctifier
5123.requirement: Defeat  bosses in the Sanctum Arena.

5225.name: Field Medicine
5225.requirement: Collect ingredients for Nicabar Steelweaver's tonics.

5242.name: Mercy of the Super Adventure
5242.description: One adventurer's glitch is another adventurer's game.
5242.requirement: Open  Glitched Chests at the end of Super Adventure Box levels.

5255.name: Special Mission: Iron Scavenger
5255.requirement: Collect  War Supplies from charr salvage found in the Drizzlewood Coast.
5255.locked_text: Unlock by using Iron Legion Special Mission Documents.

5323.name: Ice Reaver Weapon Collection
5323.requirement: Unlock all  Ice Reaver weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5328.name: Priority Strike: Cold War
5328.requirement: Complete the Cold War Strike Mission.

5361.name: In This Together
5361.requirement: Jump from the highest slope of Canopy Crag while mounted on a roller beetle.

5365.name: The Ox's Yoke: Gold
5365.requirement: Complete the Ox's Yoke adventure with a gold ranking.

5382.name: The Darkest Hour
5382.description:
The journey continues.
There is no end in sight.
<c=@flavor>"Fear is your enemy, not I."—Jormag</c>
How long will this go on?

5414.name: Treasure Sleuth
5414.requirement: Search throughout the Drizzlewood Coast for treasure hunters that have clues that lead to Olaf Olafson's treasure.

bits.text: Treasure Key Found
Clue 1: It's supposedly somewhere with harsh weather.
Clue 2: Keep an eye out for the door.
Clue 3: In talons of snow.
Clue 4: Olafson had an interest in norn and dwarven relics.
Clue 5: Near a tower.
Clue 6: Somewhere at Claw's Roost.

5490.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Brisban Wildlands
5490.requirement: Complete the Brisban Wildlands Dragon Response Mission.

5526.name: Daily Gendarran Fields Dragon Response Mission
5526.requirement: Complete the Gendarran Fields Dragon Response Mission.

5596.name: No More Sacrifices
5596.requirement: Prevent the Lake Doric champion from sacrificing villagers while the Final Boss challenge is active.

5693.name: Tide Turner: Fields of Ruin
5693.requirement: During the Dragon Response Mission, aid each recruited faction at least once while a challenge is active.

bits.text: Crystal Bloom
Ebon Vanguard
Deldrimor Dwarves
Skritt
Olmakhan
Flame Legion

5723.name: Ore Miner: Draconis Mons
5723.requirement: Mine ore  times in Draconis Mons.

5810.name: Return to Foefire Cleansing
5810.requirement: Complete the mission Foefire Cleansing in Living World Season 2 Episode 3.

5840.name: Return to Precocious Aurene
5840.requirement: Complete the mission Precocious Aurene in Living World Season 3 Episode 3.

5847.name: League Conqueror—3v3 Season Four
5847.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Four.

5882.name: Return to Voice in the Deep
5882.requirement: Complete the story mission Voice in the Deep in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 2.

5889.name: Crop Harvester: Domain of Kourna
5889.requirement: Harvest plants  times in the Domain of Kourna.

5954.name: Return to A Race to Arms
5954.requirement: Complete the story mission A Race to Arms in Living World Icebrood Saga Prologue.

5996.name: Adventurous Spirit: Arena of the Wolverine
5996.requirement: Complete the Arena of the Wolverine adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

6035.name: Court Duty: All's Mad That Ends Mad
6035.requirement: Report back to Magister Tassi in Lion's Arch to disclose the truth behind events in the Mad Realm.

6072.name: Well Armored
6072.description: You'll look smart in your vintage attire.

6085.name: Derring-Do
6085.requirement: Defeat the chapter boss without being downed.

6148.name: Ready Up: North
6148.requirement: Complete a total of  northern meta preparation events.

6200.name: For Lion's Arch
6200.requirement: Take out every Aetherblade deployed against you.

6207.name: The Haunted Altar
6207.description: Victims of the Ministry of Purity's purge of Echovald, these Canthan spirits attack anyone who comes close. Defeat them to end their pain and usher them finally on to the afterlife.
6207.requirement: Defeat the spirits haunting the Tangled Altar.

6211.name: Adept Untamed
6211.requirement: Begin training the ranger's untamed elite specialization.

6289.name: Ministry-Approved Untamed
6289.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6294.name: Quiet Death
6294.requirement: Defeat the chapter boss in the alloted time.

6370.name: Springer Fling: New Kaineng City
6370.requirement: From the entrance behind the waterfall at the Central Power Station, ride a springer to the center platform at the waterfall's edge in under 1 minute without dismounting or teleporting.

6569.name: No More Secrets
6569.requirement: Complete the story chapter No More Secrets.

6573.name: Arms of a New Cycle
6573.requirement: Speak with Leivas after binding an Aurene-based legendary weapon to your legendary armory.

6613.name: Dodging Attacks II
6613.requirement:
Dodge  incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6647.name: Scouting the Area
6647.requirement:
Speak with  scouts in Queensdale, Metrica Province, Caledon Forest, Wayfarer Foothills, or the Plains of Ashford to discover more about the local area.

<c=@reminder>Scouts appear with a spyglass icon on your map. They can point you toward nearby goals and landmarks when you speak to them.</c>

6759.name: Nightmare Climber
6759.requirement: Reach the top level of the Tower of Nightmares.

6770.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Four
6770.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Four.

6776.name: Someone in Need
6776.requirement: Help Zinnia track down the thief and free her from her bindings.

bits.text: The one you seek can be found within a living city underground.
Concealed in a cave of purple hue where ancient magics do things to you.
Return to Zinnia.
Out of sight within the place where sight once stared into space.
Return to Zinnia.
Hidden near Mount, take pursuit where up and down both lead to root.
Return to Zinnia.
Take your time within this place. To reach this one takes double the pace.
Return to Zinnia.
Found in the space where geniuses once dared to dance.
Return to Zinnia.
Hidden in the depths of where frost meets fire in the land of sand and sire.
Return to Zinnia.

6851.name: The Facet of Prisms and Boundless Light
6851.requirement: Complete all Elder Dragon weapon variant collections.

7010.name: Tower of Secrets
7010.requirement: Help the wizards and the Astral Ward take back their tower.

7023.name: Domain of Vabbi Incursions
7023.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Domain of Vabbi.

7034.name: Fantastic Flying Foxes
7034.requirement: Play with all shrine guardian infants in Amnytas at least once.

bits.text: Bastion of Strength: Watching the Astral Ward run up and down stairs.
Bastion of the Natural: Pretending to spy on the concocters.
Bastion of Knowledge: Loves to be lost among the books.
Bastion of the Obscure: Hiding with boxes of relics.
Bastion of Balance: Looking up toward Lyhr's quarters.
Bastion of the Natural: Playing in a garden.
Bastion of the Celestial: Napping near a shaded lagoon.
Bastion of the Natural: Sitting with the Astral Ward members.
Bastion of Balance: Playing above a medical plaza.
Bastion of Strength: Strength training with Rift Hunters.
???: Looking up at a theater.
Bastion of the Natural: Reflecting on life from afar.
Bastion of Strength: Pretending to be royalty inside a mighty tower.
???: Trying to skip rocks among the clouds.
Bastion of Knowledge: Trying to throw things at the World Spire from a wizard's tower.
Bastion of the Natural: Fell off a platform and tumbled around.
Bastion of Strength: Watches workshops and camps from up high.
Bastion of Balance: Watching a pond from afar.
Bastion of the Obscure: Hiding among the seaweed and chak.
Bastion of Knowledge: Got thrown off a ley line.
Bastion of the Celestial: Demonstrated its mastery of the terrain of Amnytas.
Bastion of the Natural: Trying to disrupt a meditation session.
???: Getting ready to fly to a park.
Bastion of the Obscure: Loves jumping on platforms.
Bastion of Strength: Racing to watch ritual performances.

7041.name: Honorary Astral Ward
7041.requirement: Prove your dedication to the Astral Ward.

bits.text: Scales of Dragrimmar
Strength of the Unseen
Jotun Skypiercer
Spire of the Forgotten
Echoes of the Obscure
Knowledge of the Elders

7052.name: Beta Tester
7052.requirement: Test out Taimi's upgraded communication device by calling all of your friends.

7113.name: Legendary Weapon: The Juggernaut
7113.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon The Juggernaut.

7175.name: Hell Breaks Loose
7175.requirement: Survive the ordeals of being pulled into a strange new world.

7488.name: Dungeon Delver: Sorrow's Embrace
7488.requirement: Complete any path of the Sorrow's Embrace dungeon.

7655.name: Inner Nayos Incursions
7655.requirement: Stop Kryptis incursions in Inner Nayos.

7702.name: At All Costs
7702.requirement: Fend off the large Kryptis foe in the given time limit.

7750.name: Fractal Recursion: Captain Mai Trin Boss (Weekly)
7750.requirement: Complete the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal.

7843.name: Artisan of Arms: Elementalist's Pistol
7843.description: The pistol empowers elementalists' abilities with an elementally charged round, making them more versatile.
7843.requirement: Defeat enemies with a pistol as an elementalist.

7871.name: Revenge of the Chak Gerent
7871.requirement: During the King of the Jungle event in Tangled Depths, defeat a chak gerent.

7918.name: Returning to Glint's Prophecy
7918.requirement: Meet with Ogden Stonehealer in the Grove to learn about the Return to Season 2 event.

7942.name: (Annual) Zone Runner
7942.description: The last measure of a classic is in the replay value.
7942.requirement: Complete any Zone in Super Adventure Box.

8098.name: Extractor Eyesore
8098.description: Nobody wants acid on their membranes.
8098.requirement: Use caustic grenades to damage defiance bars in the "Disable Zakiros's extractor towers" event.

8107.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Iron Marches
8107.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8107.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Iron Marches.

8175.name: Titan Researcher
8175.description: Forged from souls and thought to have been eradicated from our realm. Tyria has dealt with the titan threat once before...
8175.requirement: Assist Farrah Baelseeker in researching the titans by working with the kodan and Astral Ward to see what information they've gathered.

bits.text: Talk to Priory Researcher Farrah at Forager's Hunt on Janthir Syntri.
Talk to Born from Thunder at Forager's Hunt.
Read the titan history books at Forager's Hunt.
Talk to Rainless Meadow in the Festering Basin.
Take in the landscape in Moldering Greenwood.
Talk to Branwen in the Echoing Hills region.
Take in the stormy landscape at Echoing Hills.
Talk to Paela at the Bloodstone Research Camp.
View the landscape of the Sanguine Crater.
Take all the gathered information to the Priory library.
Update yourself on the new notes you've collected about the titans.
Say good-bye to Farrah.

8262.name: The Falling Star: Vault Dispatch
8262.requirement: On behalf of the Wizard's Vault, investigate rumors of an object that fell to Tyria on Janthir's coast.

bits.text: 1. Purchase the Falling Star Quest License from the Wizard's Vault.
2. Speak with Field Archivist Cierle in Lowland Shore.
3. Interview local scouts about the unusual sight.
4. Retrieve the unknown object.
5. Return to Field Archivist Cierle to report about what you've found.
6. Ask Morgaah Bloodseeker in the Black Citadel about crafting a specialized glove.
7. Complete the Falling Star: Crafting List achievement to gather the needed items, then speak with Morgaah Bloodseeker to craft the glove.
8. With the Meteor-Wielder's Glove equipped, retrieve the spear.
9. Return to Field Archivist Cierle to report about the spear.

8293.name: Hunting in the Wetlands
8293.description: Big game is lurking in these waters. Ready your spear paw!
8293.requirement: Defeat dangerous creatures by the waterfalls, fishing village, and bog.

bits.text: A report has been received about a basilisk rampaging in the bog.
There are reports of a valravn knight hiding near the upper waterfalls.
A valravn is lurking near the graveyard and needs to be dealt with before it eats someone's heart.
A large shark has been spotted off the coast and is interfering with the balance of sea life.
Drakes have been attracted to the local catch in the fishing village, and the kodan need a hand driving them away.

8351.name: Reflective Reading
8351.requirement: Read all the literature in Stoic Alder's home and in the Wizard's Tower.

bits.text: Letter from Lyhr
Stoic Alder's Journal
A Collective History, Volume 6

8367.name: Master Forager: Vegetables
8367.requirement: Turn in 100 vegetables as part of foraging events.

8418.name: Renowned Hero: Domain of Kourna (Weekly)
8418.requirement: Complete renown hearts in the Domain of Kourna.

8420.name: Revenge of Warden Amala (Weekly)
8420.requirement: Defeat Warden Amala during the Sunspear Uprising meta-event.

8424.name: Local Response: Elon Riverlands
8424.requirement: Complete  events in Elon Riverlands. Bounty events award additional progress.

8517.name: Returning to the Icebrood Saga
8517.requirement: Meet with Braham in Hoelbrak to learn about the Return to the Icebrood Saga bonus event.

8520.name: Reliving the Icebrood Saga
8520.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from Living World: The Icebrood Saga.

bits.text: Prologue: Coming Home
Prologue: Bad Blood
Prologue: Deeper and Deeper
Prologue: A Race to Arms
Episode 1: Silence
Episode 1: What's Left Behind
Episode 1: The Invitation
Episode 2: Chasing Ghosts
Episode 2: Voice in the Deep
Visions of the Past: Darkrime Delves
Episode 3: Pointed Parley
Episode 3: Snapping Steel
Episode 3: Turnabout
Episode 4: Behind Enemy Lines
Episode 4: A Simple Negotiation
Episode 4: One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion
Episode 5: Primordus Rising
Episode 5: Wildfire
Episode 5: Dragonstorm
Episode 5: Champion's End

8553.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Forty-Five
8553.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Five.

8566.name: Thousandfold Mercy
8566.requirement: Help free the thousand souls trapped inside the bloodstone construct.

8574.name: Search and Destroy
8574.description: I'd chase you to the ends of Tyria.
8574.requirement: Defeat the Mistburned champion in the Find and Defeat the Source of the Mists Runoff Scent event.

8621.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Inner Nayos
8621.description: And now you return home. Have you come to seek an audience with your king?
8621.requirement: Complete events in Inner Nayos. Group events will award more progress.

8719.name: Champion of Orr
8719.description:
This title can be purchased from Shiny King M'takk in Hooligan's Route in Lion's Arch if you meet the requirements. 

Surely it must be an official title if a self-proclaimed skritt king gives it to you, right?
8719.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding title.

8725.name: Relics—Janthir Wilds Set 3
8725.requirement: Collect  Janthir Wilds Set 3 relics by completing achievements or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.

bits.text: Acquire this relic from the Bava Nisos Rift Hunting achievement or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.
Acquire this relic from the Bava Nisos Mastery achievement or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.
Acquire this relic by completing the Convergence Challenge Mode—Greer: Silver achievement or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.
Acquire this relic from the Bava Nisos Explorer achievement or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.
Acquire this relic by completing the Convergence Challenge Mode—Ura: Silver Achievement or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.
Acquire this relic by completing the Convergence Challenge Mode—Decima: Silver achievement or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.

8754.name: Bava Nisos Insight: Northern Bronchial Well
8754.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery insight in Bava Nisos.
